name: How DrinkPrime contributed….
des: DrinkPrime team had started a campaign called “Free Hand Sanitizers Distribution,” intended to help out as many needy people...

name: A smart home application
des: DrinkPrime smart water purifier enabled with IOT technology that helps user to track real-time quality of their water.

name: Why 20-litre plastic water jars…..
des: Large number of people in urban India are using water cans to fulfill drinking water problems. But, how to find either these 20-liter cans are safe and drinkable?
